title: Python miniproject
content: I am in 1st sem and my python miniproject review is coming up ,can someone tell me what happens in that and do they give marks easily?

comments.body: it'll be based on your professor mainly.
So like ours is a little strict towards the things we are supposed to do for her subject but do you think having a good image in the professor's mind helps?
Depends on prof but it is always better to keep a good image just in case
